Remote control: Create a remote control designed to turn the alarm on and off for added convenience.
Schedules and timers: Add the ability for users to set specific schedules and timers, allowing the alarm to turn on/off at specific times or on a daily/weekly/monthly basis.
Disarming feature: Include a disarming feature that allows authorized users to temporarily silence or turn off the alarm without having to physically access the alarm system.
Nightlight feature: Integrate a dim light that turns on when the alarm sounds, making it easier to see when getting up in the middle of the night.

Smartphone integration: Create an app that allows users to control their alarm system, receive push notifications when the alarm is triggered, and check the battery life of the system through their smartphone.
